Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Nexus TUI chat application

Nexus is a full-screen TUI chat application integrating Claude AI with
document retrieval and MCP tool support. Built with Textual and Rich.

Features:
- Real-time streaming chat interface
- Document retrieval with @ mentions
- Command execution with / prefix
- Auto-completion for resources and commands
- MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration
- Beautiful markdown rendering
- Syntax highlighting for code blocks
EOF
)")
Bash(rm -f check_theme.py debug_input_styles.py test_input.py test_input_visibility.py input_styles_debug.txt theme_colors.txt visibility_test.log)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: reorganize project under src/ layout

Reorganized the entire project structure to follow Python best practices
with a src/ layout for better packaging and distribution.

Changes:
- Moved all source code to src/nxs/ directory
- Renamed main.py to __main__.py for proper module execution
- Updated all imports to use nxs.* namespace
- Updated pyproject.toml for src-layout packaging
- Updated pixi tasks with PYTHONPATH environment variable
- Modified __main__.py to pass PYTHONPATH to MCP server subprocess
- Updated tests to import from nxs.* namespace
- Removed temporary debug files

Project structure:
  src/nxs/
    ├── __init__.py
    ├── __main__.py          (entry point)
    ├── core/                (agent logic)
    ├── tui/                 (UI components)
    ├── prompts/             (prompt templates)
    ├── mcp_client.py
    ├── mcp_server.py
    └── utils.py

Benefits:
- Cleaner package namespace (nxs.core, nxs.tui)
- Easier to install as editable package
- Better separation of source code and project files
- Follows PEP 420 and modern Python packaging standards
EOF
)")
